title: Tangled toad's legs

properties.name: description
properties.value: Tangled toad's legs is a Gnome dish that can be made at level 40 cooking. They are used in the Gnome Restaurant minigame. They heal 15 hitpoints when eaten.

content:

Tangled toad's legs

Item ID2187

Tangled toad's legs is a Gnome dish that can be made at level 40 cooking. They are used in the Gnome Restaurant minigame. They heal 15 hitpoints when eaten.

They seem to take a second longer than most foods to restore your hitpoints. It is therefore unadvised to use these in dangerous situations where healing rapidly is a necessity.

To make a Tangled Toads' Legs:

  1. Fill a gnomebowl mould with Gianne dough to create a raw gnomebowl and bake to create a Half baked bowl, granting 30 Cooking experience.
  2. Simply right-click the Half baked bowl to select the prepare option and it will automatically add the 4 Toad's legs, 2 Cheese, 2 Equa leaves, 1 Gnome spice, and 1 Dwellberry to the Half baked bowl to create a Half made bowl, granting 50 Cooking experience.
  3. Bake the Half made bowl, which removes the Tangled Toads' Legs from the gnomebowl mould (returning it to your inventory), granting a final 105 Cooking experience for a grand total of 185 experience for making the dish.

Like all gnome foods, they stop burning at Cooking level 38.

[[File:Tangled toad's legs detail.png|left|130px]]
'''Tangled toad's legs''' is a [[gnome cooking|Gnome dish]] that can be made at level 40 [[cooking]]. They are used in the [[Gnome Restaurant]] minigame. They heal 15 [[hitpoints]] when eaten.

They seem to take a second longer than most foods to restore your hitpoints. It is therefore unadvised to use these in dangerous situations where healing rapidly is a necessity.

To make a Tangled Toads' Legs:
#Fill a [[gnomebowl mould]] with [[Gianne dough]] to create a [[raw gnomebowl]] and bake to create a [[Half baked bowl]], granting 30 Cooking experience.
#Simply right-click the [[Half baked bowl]] to select the prepare option and it will automatically add the 4 [[Toad's legs]], 2 [[Cheese]], 2 [[Equa leaves]], 1 [[Gnome spice]], and 1 [[Dwellberries|Dwellberry]] to the Half baked bowl to create a [[Half made bowl]], granting 50 Cooking experience.
#Bake the Half made bowl, which removes the Tangled Toads' Legs from the gnomebowl mould (returning it to your inventory), granting a final 105 Cooking experience for a grand total of 185 experience for making the dish.

Like all gnome foods, they stop burning at [[Cooking]] level 38.
